alert.note: Alert for Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Western Mogollon Rim (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 29 at 3:18AM MST until March 30 at 2:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON TO 2 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...The western Mogollon Rim, especially northeast of high terrain including portions of the Little Colorado River Valley. * WHEN...From 2 PM MST this afternoon to 2 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. In addition, winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Western Mogollon Rim
